translations.translation: no good friend will ask about his friend
And no friend inquires after friend
and no bosom friend will enquire about any of his bosom friends
even intimate friends will not inquire about their friends,
And no friend will ask concerning his friend.
And no friend will ask a friend,
And friend shall not ask of friend
no loyal friend shall question loyal friend,
And no familiar friend will ask a question of his friend
and no friend will ask about his friend,
And not a friend shall ask a friend,
and no friend will inquire about [the welfare of his] friend,
And no friend will ask after a friend,
And no friend will ask of a friend,
No loyal friend will ask another loyal friend
No friend will care about his friend.
And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,
[70:10] And no friend will inquire about his friend, [no] relative [will inquire] about his relative, each being preoccupied with his own predicament.
And no familiar friend will ask a question of his friend) no relative will ask about his relative

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَلاَ يَسْأَلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيماً } معناه قريب قريباً

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } حينئذٍ { لاَ يَسْأَلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيماً } [المعارج: 10] أي: لا يسأل قريب عن قريبه، وصديق عن صديقه، بل يومئذ

[عبس: 34-35]

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: [فاطر:27]، فإذا بُسّت وطُيِّرَتْ في الجو أشبهت العهن المنفوش إذا أطارته الريح، { ولا يَسألُ حميمٌ حميماً } أي: لا يسأل قريب عن قريبه لاشتغاله بنفسه، ومَن قرأ بضم الياء فمعناه: لا يُسأل عنه، بل كلّ واحد يُسألُ عن نفسه، فلا يُطالب أحد بذنب أحد
